title: Certify
description: ID credentials issuance tool to create, validate, and digitally sign identity credentials according to W3C standards for global interoperability

bullets.title: SECURED
bullets.description: Biometric technologies guarantee that credentials are managed by the true owner

bullets.title: CERTIFIED
bullets.description: Post-quantum cryptography provides government-level security for the issuing authority

bulletOne.title: 1. Create credential schema
bulletOne.description: Build the structure of the credential and which data need to be issued

bulletTwo.title: 2. Issue Credential
bulletTwo.description: The credential is issued and the end-user notified.
